substitution.copyText: Ham. Haste me to know't that I with wings as swift
substitution.amendedText: Ham. Haste me to know it, that I, with wings as swift

substitution.copyText: '' The duller should'st thou be than the fat weed | '' That roots it self in case on Lethe's wharf, | '' Would'st thou not sir in this:
Ham. O my Prophetick soul, my Uncle?
substitution.amendedText: Ham. O, my Prophetick soul! my Uncle?

substitution.copyText: '' With witchcraft of his wits, with his trait'rous gifts, | '' O wicked wits, and gifts that have the power | '' So to seduce!
'' but vertue, as it never will be mov'd
